name: Sofa
description: You might say that this is the perfect sofa, because it offers all the benefits of reclining furniture without the drawbacks. It brings enviable design and style with chenille fabric.

name: King bed
description: The Langston bedroom group is the perfect option for essential bedroom furnishing. Clean lines and Kenlin metal drawer glides provide smooth function and English dovetail construction maintains strength.

name: Queen bed
description: The Providence bed is traditional with a modern twist. The simple spindles feature round finials and castings adding simple style to this conventional frame. The metal construction features.

name: Chir
description: Create a coastal look in your home with the Fusion Seashore Sand square cocktail ottoman. This piece complements the Fusion Max Pearl collection that features matching accent pillows.

name: Table
description: Stand out with the Fairview Dining Collection. The table is a show stopper with beautiful open work scrolling detail and a stunning herringbone table top design. Upgrade any living space.

name: Wardrobe
description: With sophisticated style and a dark finish, the Huey Vineyard Chest is sure to enhance your bedroom''s decor with a rich traditional design that offers a warm comfortable atmosphere.  With the antique pewter color metal hardware perfectly complementing the style.
